Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teachers tend to give feedback based on how much time they can allocate per student. This quality of feedback may vary, whereas there is a general standard of feedback which, given the right prompts, GenAI can provide equally within seconds.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI felt more subjective, teacher feedback more objective
